ghostPost.plaintext:
Manage your billing details for your Ghost(Pro) account any time using the
billing settings menu. 

To update your credit card details, plan and billing frequency log in to your
Ghost.org account and update your information at my.ghost.org/billing
[https://my.ghost.org/billing].

Ensure you use an up-to-date email address in your Ghost.org account settings
too - this way we can let you know if there are any issues with your account or
publication. For billing related questions, feel free to reach out to support@ghost.org  for
help.
ghostPost.html:
Manage your billing details for your Ghost(Pro) account any time using the billing settings menu.

To update your credit card details, plan and billing frequency log in to your Ghost.org account and update your information at my.ghost.org/billing.

Ensure you use an up-to-date email address in your Ghost.org account settings too - this way we can let you know if there are any issues with your account or publication.

For billing related questions, feel free to reach out to support@ghost.org for help.
